Package it.polimi.ingsw.listeners

Class PlayerSetupListener

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.listeners.PlayerSetupListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeListener, EventListener
public class PlayerSetupListener extends Object implements PropertyChangeListener
PlayerSetupListener is a PropertyChangeListener that listen to the InitController in order to inform clients that a player has chosen a tower or a wizard in the setup phase.
See Also:
  • PropertyChangeListener

      playerName - the name of the player
